quiz.question: ____ retention
quiz.explanation: 保留, 数据保留. The company has a strict data retention policy. 公司有严格的数据保留政策。

quiz.question: _____ __ contention
quiz.explanation: 争论, 争论点. The budget became a major point of contention. 预算成为主要的争论点。

quiz.question: ______ abstention
quiz.explanation: 弃权, 政策弃权. Several members chose policy abstention on the vote. 几名成员在投票中选择了政策弃权。

quiz.question: _________ distention
quiz.explanation: 膨胀, 腹部膨胀. The patient complained of abdominal distention. 患者抱怨腹部膨胀。

quiz.question: __________ subvention
quiz.explanation: 补助金, 政府补助金. The theater received government subvention. 剧院获得了政府补助金。

quiz.question: ______ locomotion
quiz.explanation: 移动, 动物移动. Scientists study animal locomotion patterns. 科学家研究动物移动模式。

quiz.question: _____ caption
quiz.explanation: 标题, 图片标题. The image caption explained the photo. 图片标题解释了照片。

quiz.question: deception ____
quiz.explanation: 欺骗, 欺骗计划. The military used a deception plan. 军方使用了欺骗计划。

quiz.question: _______ inception
quiz.explanation: 开始, 项目开始. The project inception was in 2020. 项目开始于2020年。

quiz.question: __________ conception
quiz.explanation: 受孕, 圣灵感孕. Catholics celebrate the immaculate conception. 天主教徒庆祝圣灵感孕。

quiz.question: ______ perception
quiz.explanation: 感知, 视觉感知. Visual perception affects our understanding. 视觉感知影响我们的理解。

quiz.question: ______'_ prescription
quiz.explanation: 处方, 医生处方. The pharmacy filled the doctor's prescription. 药房配了医生的处方。

quiz.question: ____ presumption
quiz.explanation: 假定, 大胆的假定. His bold presumption proved incorrect. 他大胆的假定证明是不正确的。

quiz.question: ________ desertion
quiz.explanation: 开小差, 军事开小差. The soldier faced charges of military desertion. 士兵面临军事开小差的指控。

quiz.question: _______ self-assertion
quiz.explanation: 自我主张, 健康的自我主张. Therapy encouraged healthy self-assertion. 治疗鼓励健康的自我主张。

quiz.question: ___ digestion
quiz.explanation: 消化, 帮助消化. Walking after meals can aid digestion. 饭后散步可以帮助消化。

quiz.question: ____ ingestion
quiz.explanation: 摄取, 食物摄取. Food ingestion should be monitored carefully. 食物摄取应该仔细监测。

quiz.question: ______ retribution
quiz.explanation: 报应, 神圣的报应. They believed in divine retribution. 他们相信神圣的报应。

quiz.question: ________ prosecution
quiz.explanation: 起诉, 刑事起诉. The case proceeded to criminal prosecution. 案件进入刑事起诉程序。

quiz.question: ___ locution
quiz.explanation: 措辞, 奇怪的措辞. His speech contained an odd locution. 他的演讲包含奇怪的措辞。

quiz.question: elocution ______
quiz.explanation: 演讲技巧, 演讲技巧课. She took elocution lesson to improve speaking. 她上演讲技巧课来提高演讲能力。

quiz.question: _______ circumlocution
quiz.explanation: 迂回说法, 无休止的迂回说法. His endless circumlocution confused listeners. 他无休止的迂回说法使听众困惑。

quiz.question: _______ ablution
quiz.explanation: 沐浴, 晨浴. He performed his morning ablution ritual. 他进行了晨浴仪式。

quiz.question: _______ diminution
quiz.explanation: 减少, 逐渐减少. There was a gradual diminution in quality. 质量出现了逐渐减少。

quiz.question: _____ destitution
quiz.explanation: 贫困, 完全的贫困. Refugees faced utter destitution. 难民面临完全的贫困。

quiz.question: ____ restitution
quiz.explanation: 赔偿, 进行赔偿. The thief agreed to make restitution. 小偷同意进行赔偿。

quiz.question: ___________ institution
quiz.explanation: 机构, 教育机构. Universities are important educational institution. 大学是重要的教育机构。

quiz.question: _______ constitution
quiz.explanation: 宪法, 成文宪法. The country has a written constitution. 该国有成文宪法。

quiz.question: gallon ___
quiz.explanation: 加仑, 加仑罐. She filled a gallon jug with water. 她用水装满了加仑罐。

quiz.question: ____ carillon
quiz.explanation: 钟琴, 钟琴. The bell carillon played at noon. 钟琴在中午演奏。

quiz.question: colon ______
quiz.explanation: 结肠, 结肠癌. Screening helps detect colon cancer early. 筛查有助于早期发现结肠癌。

quiz.question: _____ pylon
quiz.explanation: 电线杆, 电力塔. Power pylon lines crossed the countryside. 电力塔线路穿越乡村。

quiz.question: ____ salmon
quiz.explanation: 鲑鱼, 野生鲑鱼. Wild salmon swim upstream to spawn. 野生鲑鱼逆流而上产卵。

quiz.question: ______ sermon
quiz.explanation: 布道, 星期日布道. The pastor delivered his Sunday sermon. 牧师发表了星期日布道。

quiz.question: ______ canon
quiz.explanation: 教规, 教会教规. Church canon governs religious practices. 教会教规管理宗教活动。

quiz.question: _ boon __
quiz.explanation: 恩惠, 对...的恩惠. The new road is a boon to commerce. 新路对商业是恩惠。

quiz.question: ____ cocoon
quiz.explanation: 茧, 丝茧. The caterpillar spins a silk cocoon. 毛虫吐丝茧。

quiz.question: ____ ______ tycoon
quiz.explanation: 大亨, 房地产大亨. The real estate tycoon owned many properties. 房地产大亨拥有许多房产。

quiz.question: _______ lagoon
quiz.explanation: 泻湖, 沿海泻湖. The coastal lagoon teemed with fish. 沿海泻湖充满了鱼。

quiz.question: _______ typhoon
quiz.explanation: 台风, 太平洋台风. A powerful Pacific typhoon approached. 一场强大的太平洋台风正在逼近。

quiz.question: lampoon _ __________
quiz.explanation: 讽刺, 讽刺政客. The comedian would lampoon a politician. 喜剧演员会讽刺政客。

quiz.question: _____ _ harpoon
quiz.explanation: 鱼叉, 投掷鱼叉. The whaler prepared to throw a harpoon. 捕鲸人准备投掷鱼叉。

quiz.question: marooned ______
quiz.explanation: 困住, 被困的水手. The marooned sailor was stranded on an island. 被困的水手被困在岛上。

quiz.question: ________ poltroon
quiz.explanation: 懦夫, 懦弱的懦夫. The cowardly poltroon fled from battle. 懦弱的懦夫从战场逃跑。

quiz.question: ______ monsoon
quiz.explanation: 季风, 夏季季风. The summer monsoon brings heavy rains. 夏季季风带来大雨。

quiz.question: bassoon ____
quiz.explanation: 巴松管, 巴松管独奏. The musician performed a bassoon solo. 音乐家演奏了巴松管独奏。

quiz.question: _____ baron
quiz.explanation: 男爵, 媒体大亨. The media baron owned several newspapers. 媒体大亨拥有几家报纸。

quiz.question: ____ gridiron
quiz.explanation: 烤架, 铁烤架. They cooked meat on an iron gridiron. 他们在铁烤架上烤肉。

quiz.question: environ ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 围绕, 围绕城市. Mountains environ the city on all sides. 群山从四面环绕城市。

quiz.question: ____ neutron
quiz.explanation: 中子, 自由中子. Nuclear reactions release free neutron. 核反应释放自由中子。

quiz.question: ______ treason
quiz.explanation: 叛国, 犯叛国罪. The spy was accused of commit treason. 间谍被指控犯叛国罪。

quiz.question: _______ mason
quiz.explanation: 石匠, 熟练的石匠. The skilled mason built beautiful walls. 熟练的石匠建造了美丽的墙。

quiz.question: liaison _______
quiz.explanation: 联络, 联络官. The liaison officer coordinated efforts. 联络官协调工作。

quiz.question: ____ benison
quiz.explanation: 祝福, 给予祝福. The elder would give benison to travelers. 长者会给旅行者祝福。

quiz.question: ____ comparison
quiz.explanation: 比较, 进行比较. We should make comparison between options. 我们应该在选项之间进行比较。

quiz.question: jettison _____
quiz.explanation: 抛弃, 抛弃货物. The ship had to jettison cargo in the storm. 船在风暴中不得不抛弃货物。

quiz.question: ______ arson
quiz.explanation: 纵火, 犯纵火罪. The suspect was charged with commit arson. 嫌疑人被指控犯纵火罪。

quiz.question: ______ baton
quiz.explanation: 警棍, 警察警棍. Officers carried a police baton. 警官携带警察警棍。

quiz.question: _______ simpleton
quiz.explanation: 傻瓜, 村里的傻瓜. The village simpleton was often mocked. 村里的傻瓜经常被嘲笑。

quiz.question: ______ plankton
quiz.explanation: 浮游生物, 海洋浮游生物. Whales feed on marine plankton. 鲸鱼以海洋浮游生物为食。

quiz.question: wanton ___________
quiz.explanation: 肆意的, 肆意的破坏. The war caused wanton destruction. 战争造成了肆意的破坏。

quiz.question: mutton ____
quiz.explanation: 羊肉, 羊肉炖菜. The cook prepared mutton stew. 厨师准备了羊肉炖菜。

quiz.question: ___ crayon
quiz.explanation: 蜡笔, 蜡笔. Children drew pictures with wax crayon. 孩子们用蜡笔画画。

quiz.question: halcyon ____
quiz.explanation: 宁静的, 宁静的日子. She remembered the halcyon days of youth. 她记得青春宁静的日子。

quiz.question: blazon ____
quiz.explanation: 纹章, 纹章. The knight's blazon arms adorned his shield. 骑士的纹章装饰了他的盾牌。

quiz.question: barn ___
quiz.explanation: 谷仓, 仓鸮. A barn owl nested in the rafters. 一只仓鸮在椽子上筑巢。

quiz.question: ____ _ yarn
quiz.explanation: 纱线, 讲故事. The old sailor would spin a yarn. 老水手会讲故事。

quiz.question: discern ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 识别, 识别模式. Scientists tried to discern the pattern. 科学家试图识别模式。

quiz.question: fern _____
quiz.explanation: 蕨类, 蕨叶. The fern frond unfurled in spring. 蕨叶在春天展开。

quiz.question: _______ lectern
quiz.explanation: 讲台, 讲台. The professor stood at the lecture lectern. 教授站在讲台上。

quiz.question: stern _______
quiz.explanation: 严厉的, 严厉的警告. The judge issued a stern warning. 法官发出了严厉的警告。

quiz.question: _____ cistern
quiz.explanation: 蓄水池, 蓄水池. The water cistern collected rainwater. 蓄水池收集雨水。

quiz.question: _________ cavern
quiz.explanation: 洞穴, 石灰岩洞穴. Explorers discovered a limestone cavern. 探险者发现了石灰岩洞穴。

quiz.question: inborn ______
quiz.explanation: 天生的, 天生的才能. She possessed inborn talent for music. 她拥有音乐的天生才能。

quiz.question: suborn _______
quiz.explanation: 唆使, 唆使伪证. The lawyer tried to suborn perjury. 律师试图唆使伪证。

quiz.question: ___ acorn
quiz.explanation: 橡子, 橡树橡子. Squirrels gather oak acorn in autumn. 松鼠在秋天收集橡树橡子。

quiz.question: ________ unicorn
quiz.explanation: 独角兽, 神话独角兽. Stories tell of the mythical unicorn. 故事讲述神话独角兽。

quiz.question: ____ ___ horn
quiz.explanation: 号角, 吹号角. The herald would blow the horn. 传令官会吹号角。

quiz.question: ________ greenhorn
quiz.explanation: 新手, 商业新手. The business greenhorn made rookie mistakes. 商业新手犯了新手错误。

quiz.question: timeworn _____é
quiz.explanation: 陈旧的, 陈旧的陈词滥调. The speech used timeworn cliché. 演讲使用了陈旧的陈词滥调。

quiz.question: careworn ____
quiz.explanation: 饱经风霜的, 饱经风霜的脸. Her careworn face showed years of struggle. 她饱经风霜的脸显示出多年的挣扎。

quiz.question: shopworn _____
quiz.explanation: 陈腐的, 陈腐的想法. The proposal contained shopworn ideas. 提案包含陈腐的想法。

quiz.question: adjourn ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 休会, 休会. The chairman decided to adjourn the meeting. 主席决定休会。

quiz.question: mourn _____
quiz.explanation: 哀悼, 哀悼死亡. The nation gathered to mourn death. 全国聚集哀悼死亡。

quiz.question: spurn __ _____
quiz.explanation: 拒绝, 拒绝提议. He decided to spurn an offer. 他决定拒绝提议。

quiz.question: shun _________
quiz.explanation: 避开, 避开公众关注. The recluse chose to shun publicity. 隐士选择避开公众关注。

quiz.question: ____ _ pun
quiz.explanation: 双关语, 说双关语. The comedian would make a pun. 喜剧演员会说双关语。

quiz.question: spawn _____
quiz.explanation: 产生, 产生想法. Brainstorming sessions spawn ideas. 头脑风暴会议产生想法。

quiz.question: full-blown ______
quiz.explanation: 全面的, 全面的危机. The situation became a full-blown crisis. 情况变成了全面的危机。

quiz.question: _____ clown
quiz.explanation: 小丑, 班级小丑. He was known as the class clown. 他被称为班级小丑。

quiz.question: ____ crown
quiz.explanation: 王冠, 金王冠. The king wore a gold crown. 国王戴着金王冠。

quiz.question: ____ fresco
quiz.explanation: 壁画, 墙壁壁画. Michelangelo painted a famous wall fresco. 米开朗基罗绘制了著名的墙壁壁画。

quiz.question: ________ tornado
quiz.explanation: 龙卷风, 强大的龙卷风. A powerful tornado destroyed homes. 强大的龙卷风摧毁了房屋。

quiz.question: ______ desperado
quiz.explanation: 亡命之徒, 蒙面亡命之徒. The masked desperado robbed the bank. 蒙面亡命之徒抢劫了银行。

quiz.question: _____ bravado
quiz.explanation: 虚张声势, 自大的虚张声势. His cocky bravado hid insecurity. 他自大的虚张声势掩盖了不安全感。

quiz.question: ____ _ torpedo
quiz.explanation: 鱼雷, 发射鱼雷. The submarine prepared to fire a torpedo. 潜艇准备发射鱼雷。

quiz.question: _________ credo
quiz.explanation: 信条, 公司信条. The corporate credo emphasized integrity. 公司信条强调诚信。

quiz.question: _____ tuxedo
quiz.explanation: 礼服, 黑色礼服. The groom wore a black tuxedo. 新郎穿着黑色礼服。

quiz.question: _______ diminuendo
quiz.explanation: 渐弱, 逐渐渐弱. The music ended in a gradual diminuendo. 音乐在逐渐渐弱中结束。

quiz.question: ____ innuendo
quiz.explanation: 影射, 阴暗的影射. The speech contained dark innuendo. 演讲包含阴暗的影射。
